nodes.bodyText: Definitely need to add the same comment in these samples! 👍
@JonLavi yeh I like this wording! Minor change I'd make would be to replace "gets" with "is", just reads a little better I find.
with your comment from my garbage collection PR in mind, should we change this to selectedFeature?
Definitely! Thanks for pointing that out!

This is okay, but seems a little overkill for a simple sample. We've had discussions before about omitting some best practices for the sake of brevity/focus. Should get approval from Lucas/Mike before making more of these changes.
Perhaps identifiedFeature would be a better name? Looks odd to select the selected feature.
I realize there wasn't a comment before, but we should really have one for why we changed the opacity
if only we had a visible property to bind to.... @mbcoder 😜
